sentences.sContent: If there are aspects of your life that displease you make you feel regret, this is an opportunity to change direction.
sentences.sContent_eng: If there are aspects of your life that displease you make you feel regret, this is an opportunity to change direction.
sentences.sCn: 如果你生活中那些使你不愉快的方面让你觉得懊悔，那么这正是你改变方向的时机。

words.tran: 使…不快（displease的过去式和过去分词）
